actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A Bill to require that certain procedures be followed with respect to the Internal Revenue Service's "Proposed Revenue Procedure on Private Tax-Exempt Schools".
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Provides that the Internal Revenue Service's "Proposed Revenue Procedure on Private Tax-Exempt Schools" or any similar proposal shall not take effect unless the Service complies with recently published regulations of the Department of the Treasury requiring public hearings and Congressional approval of such proposals.

titles.title: A Bill to require that certain procedures be followed with respect to the Internal Revenue Service's "Proposed Revenue Procedure on Private Tax-Exempt Schools".
